full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Forensic Light Source for RCMP

**Reference:** PW-23-01028280
**Amendment:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 202302073/A
**Publication Date:** 01/03/2023
**Tender Closing Date:** 30/03/2023 (5:00 PM ET)

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking proposals for the supply and delivery of a Forensic Light Source to E Division Headquarters in Surrey, British Columbia.

**Background and Description:**
The proposal must provide a Forensic Light Source that meets the specifications outlined in the solicitation documents. The successful supplier must be able to deliver the unit within the designated timeframe.

**Scope and Requirements:**
The Forensic Light Source must be capable of producing high-intensity illumination and meeting the requirements outlined in the solicitation document. The successful supplier must be able to provide training and support for the end-users.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The evaluation criteria include, but are not limited to:

* Technical capability to meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation document
* Supplier's experience in providing similar products to government agencies
* Pricing and delivery timelines

**Trade Agreements:**
This solicitation is subject to the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**
The Forensic Light Source will be used in British Columbia.

**Regions of Delivery:**
The Forensic Light Source will be delivered to E Division Headquarters in Surrey, British Columbia.

**Contact Information:**
For further information, please contact Kathleen Nillas at Kathleen.nillas@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Attachments:**
The solicitation documents and amendment can be found on the Government of Canada's Buyandsell.gc.ca website.

Please note that the solicitation is expired and no further submissions will be accepted.
